ttp_template:
<group name="issuer_cn_issuer_on_issuer_ou_serial_number">
  Status: {{STATUS | ORPHRASE}}
  Storage: {{STORAGE | ORPHRASE}}
  Certificate Serial Number (hex): {{SERIAL_NUMBER | ORPHRASE}}
  Certificate Usage: {{USAGE | ORPHRASE}}
  Organization Unit: {{ISSUER_OU | ORPHRASE}}
  Organization Name: {{ISSUER_ON | ORPHRASE}}
  Common Name: {{ISSUER_CN | ORPHRASE}}
  Name: {{SUBJECT_NAME | ORPHRASE}}
  start date: {{VALIDITY_START | ORPHRASE}}
  end  date: {{VALIDITY_END | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
cli_content:
Certificate
  Status: Available
  Certificate Serial Number (hex): 123ABC456
  Certificate Usage: General Purpose
  Issuer: 
    Organization Unit: Example Unit
    Organization Name: Example Org
    Common Name: Example Root CA
  Subject:
    Name: Example Cert
  Validity Date:
    start date: 12:00:00 UTC Jan 1 2022
    end   date: 12:00:00 UTC Jan 1 2025
  Storage: nvram

Certificate
  Status: Available
  Certificate Serial Number (hex): 789DEF012
  Certificate Usage: Server Auth
  Issuer: 
    Organization Unit: Another Unit
    Organization Name: Another Org
    Common Name: Another Root CA
  Subject:
    Name: Another Cert
  Validity Date:
    start date: 00:00:00 UTC Feb 1 2023
    end   date: 00:00:00 UTC Feb 1 2026
  Storage: nvram
textfsm_template:
Value STATUS (Available|Revoked|Expired)
Value SERIAL_NUMBER (\S+)
Value USAGE (\S+ \S+)
Value ISSUER_OU (.*)
Value ISSUER_ON (.*)
Value ISSUER_CN (.*)
Value SUBJECT_NAME (.*)
Value VALIDITY_START (.*)
Value VALIDITY_END (.*)
Value STORAGE (\S+)

Start
  ^Certificate -> Record StartRecord

StartRecord
  ^\s*Status:\s+${STATUS}\s*$$
  ^\s*Certificate Serial Number \(hex\):\s+${SERIAL_NUMBER}\s*$$
  ^\s*Certificate Usage:\s+${USAGE}\s*$$
  ^\s*Issuer:\s*$$
  ^\s*Organization Unit:\s+${ISSUER_OU}\s*$$
  ^\s*Organization Name:\s+${ISSUER_ON}\s*$$
  ^\s*Common Name:\s+${ISSUER_CN}\s*$$
  ^\s*Subject:\s*$$
  ^\s*Name:\s+${SUBJECT_NAME}\s*$$
  ^\s*Validity Date:\s*$$
  ^\s*start date:\s+${VALIDITY_START}\s*$$
  ^\s*end\s*date:\s+${VALIDITY_END}\s*$$
  ^\s*Storage:\s+${STORAGE}\s*$$
